text: Artūras Paulauskas (born 23 August 1953) is a Lithuanian politician. He was the Speaker of Seimas, the parliament of Lithuania, from 2000 to 2006, and he was Acting President of Lithuania from 6 April 2004 to 12 July 2004. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Politicians from Vilnius Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Lithuania Category:Speakers of the Seimas
title: Artūras Paulauskas
